short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate contrast ratio between foreground and background colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color Contrast Checker is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to evaluate the color contrast between foreground and background for accessibility purposes. It displays the contrast ratio along with a text preview, and it indicates whether the contrast ratio passes or fails for both small and large text sizes.
